@StuRobson @hankchizljaw @MattShieldsDev @seaotta @cassidoo @emilyvc_ @jh3yy Interesting. As a biscuit connoisseur, I aim to make them accessible to all, and no longer the realm of the elite. Hence, I merely offer pairing "suggestions" based on my expertise. I will never mandate the "one true biscuit" to pair with a talk. People's preferences are valid.
